content: frosty version a-2 january 7 2007 materials needed -any worsted weight yarn i used red heart super saver white 1 ounce / black green orange and brown small amount -g hook or hook needed to obtain gauge -stuffing of your choice this can be wool roving polyester fiberfill fabric scraps of yarn…use your imagination -tapestry needle gauge 4 sts and 4 row per inch in single_crochet body nd round 1 w/ white chain 2 8 single_crochet in 2 chain from hook join w/ slip_stitch 8 single_crochet round 2 chain 1 2 single_crochet in ea st around join w/ slip_stitch 16 single_crochet round 3 chain 1 single_crochet in next st 2 single_crochet in next st around join w/ slip_stitch 24 single_crochet round 4 chain 1 single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next st around join w/ slip_stitch 32 single_crochet round 5 working in the back loops only chain 1 single_crochet in ea single_crochet around join w/ slip_stitch 32 single_crochet rnds 6-7 chain 1 single_crochet in ea single_crochet around join w/ slip_stitch round 8 chain 1 single_crochet in next 3 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next st around join w/ slip_stitch 40 single_crochet rnds 9-10 repeat round 6 round 11 chain 1 single_crochet in next 3 single_crochet single_crochet decrease around join w/ slip_stitch 32 single_crochet round 12 repeat round 6 round 13 chain 1 single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet single_crochet decrease around join w/ slip_stitch 24 single_crochet round 14 repeat round 6 round 15 chain 1 single_crochet in next 4 single_crochet single_crochet decrease around join w/ slip_stitch 20 single_crochet round 16 chain 1 single_crochet in next 4 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next st around join w/ slip_stitch 24 single_crochet round 17 repeat round 6 round 18 chain 1 single_crochet in next 5 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next st around join w/ slip_stitch 28 single_crochet round 19 repeat round 6 round 20 chain 1 single_crochet in next 5 single_crochet single_crochet decrease around join w/ slip_stitch 24 single_crochet round 21 repeat round 6 round 22 chain 1 single_crochet in next 4 single_crochet single_crochet decrease around join in next 2 single_crochet single_crochet decrease around join w/ slip_stitch 15 single_crochet finish off stuff w/ filling of your choice hat round 24 w/ black working in the back loops only repeat round 6 join w/ slip_stitch 15 single_crochet rnds 25-27 repeat round 6 round 28 working in the back loops only chain 1 single_crochet in next single_crochet single_crochet decrease around join w/ slip_stitch 10
